becomeHost(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32.details: Request node wants to become a distribution node after buying the content	Also, if this transaction succeeds, contract will release all of the earnings that are	currently in escrow for content creator/host/The AO

params._baseChallengeR: The R part of signature when signing the base challenge
params._baseChallengeS: The S part of signature when signing the base challenge
params._baseChallengeV: The V part of signature when signing the base challenge
params._contentDatKey: The dat key of the content
params._encChallenge: The encrypted challenge string (PUBLIC KEY) of the content unique to the host
params._metadataDatKey: The dat key of the content's metadata
params._purchaseReceiptId: The ID of the Purchase Receipt

contentHostPaidByAO(bytes32).details: Determine the how much the content is paid by AO given a contentHostId

params._contentHostId: The content host ID to be checked

contentHostPrice(bytes32).details: Determine the content price hosted by a host

params._contentHostId: The content host ID to be checked

create(address,bytes32,string,string,str.details: Add the distribution node info that hosts the content

params._contentDatKey: The dat key of the content
params._encChallenge: The encrypted challenge string (PUBLIC KEY) of the content unique to the host
params._metadataDatKey: The dat key of the content's metadata
params._stakedContentId: The ID of the staked content

getById(bytes32).details: Return content host info at a given ID

params._contentHostId: The ID of the hosted content

getById(bytes32).return: The ID of the staked contentThe ID of the contentaddress of the hostthe dat key of the contentthe dat key of the content's metadata

isExist(bytes32).details: Check whether or not a contentHostId exist

params._contentHostId: The content host ID to be checked

setWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist `_account` address to transact on behalf of others

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of The AO to new address

params._theAO: The new address to be transferred
